title: CDRM: Causal disentangled representation learning for missing data
details: M Chen, H Wang, R Wang, Y Peng, H Zhang - Knowledge-Based Systems, 2024
abstract: Missing data pose significant challenges during representation learning of observational data. The incompleteness of data can result in a deterioration of generative performance in disentangled representation learning. Conventional data …

title: Bidirectional Variational Autoencoders
abstract: We present the new bidirectional variational autoencoder (BVAE) network architecture. The BVAE uses a single neural network both to encode and decode instead of an encoderdecoder network pair. The network encodes in the forward …
